name.ja: マルチプル・アダプター・ユニット

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster, send 1 face-up Level 5 or higher Machine Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Change that Normal Summoned monster to face-down Defense Position. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Cyber Assault Dragon" or "Cyber Stealth Dragon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.
